title: NERF TEEMO
body: so sick of teemo shrooms oh and the blind it last to long and shrooms do to much damage

replies.body: I miss when I was this bad at this game.
Right? It was such a good time, running things Sivir/Graves duo top and shit. How time flies.

> [{quoted}](name=RenownedWheat42,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PePcrBQj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-14T04:51:42.232+0000)
>
> Right? It was such a good time, running things Sivir/Graves duo top and shit. How time flies.

Yeah, things were simpler back then when I didn't understand the intricacies of balance.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PePcrBQj,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-14T04:56:57.853+0000)
>
> Yeah, things were simpler back then when I didn't understand the intricacies of balance.

What is 'fun'?

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PePcrBQj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-14T04:49:49.791+0000)
>
> I miss when I was this bad at this game.

I dont.
just get that red trinket at lvl 6 and build a little mr against him, don't be afraid to all him since he has no escape. good luck, unless you're a squishie
